update.description:
This pull request goes before a following one that will address issue #1.

It refactors the Packet class including different message types and containing information about the types advertised.

Just  a reminder for testing: Use the latest czmq version because is the one that contains the patch for OS X.
update.title: Packet refactor

content.raw: I can't reproduce the problem anymore....
I think the build will fail if czmq 3.x.x is not installed.
content.html: I think the build will fail if czmq 3.x.x is not installed.

content.raw: Is the test failing with czmq 3.x.x?

I get the following error when running INTEGRATION_twoProcessesSrvCallSync2

```
#!c++

New disconnection detected 
	Process UUID: 31620afa-cea5-42df-9162-d55ce848d0ed
Service call connection callback
Topic: /foo
Addr: tcp://192.168.1.220:51352
Ctrl Addr: 
Process UUID: [31620afa-cea5-42df-9162-d55ce848d0ed]
Node UUID: [8777345e-0227-4798-9645-ead0b1890002]
Found a service call responser at [tcp://192.168.1.220:51352]
[  FAILED  ] twoProcSrvCallSync2.SrvTwoProcs (2609 ms)
```
